product_name: Komperdell Carbon Expedition V4 Trekking Poles - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Carbon Expedition V4 Trekking Poles fold down to an extremely small packed size. Their carbon and aluminum alloy construction makes them light and strong. Poles fold down to 45cm for packing and telescope from 120 - 145cm. 100% carbon upper shafts feature a Power Lock II lock mechanism, offering easy and secure fixing with only 1 click. Titanal aluminum alloy lower shafts feature a foldable Approach 1.0 mechanism. EVA foam grips are heat-insulating and lighter weight than traditional grips; padded wrist straps offer a high level of comfort. Trekking basket/tip construction with pivoting ball mechanisms allow for optimal adjustment to any terrain. The Komperdell Carbon Expedition V4 Trekking Poles feature tungsten carbide tips. Closeout.
short_description: The Komperdell Carbon Expedition V4 Trekking Poles fold down to an extremely small packed size. Their carbon and aluminum alloy construction makes them light and strong.
